content:
How frequently does Inferno CE pick up test updates from BDT?

I have been testing our APIs with BDT directly, I know BDT has also changed a bit during the past month or so in terms of configuration support and even some of the tests have been modified that don't seem to be in CE...
I know we are currently a few versions behind right now. @Yunwei Wang was looking at closing the gap at the last connectathon -- did we get those changes in Yunwei?
All issues observed during Connectathon are fixed and waiting for the next release. I noticed there are several change in BDT since July 1st. I am looking those commits.
